OfflineDescription:
The wallet is now offline. 
When offline, you can still sign transactions with the wallet. 
Why my wallet is offline?
reasons_1: 1. You have manually set the wallet to ‘Offline Mode’. In this mode, your wallet will always keep offline regardless of network connection. You can shift wallet mode (Online/Offline) in settings menu.
reasons_2: 2. The wallet has not been updated to the latest version. You may need to update the wallet or wait for a new version release.
reasons_3: 3. Something wrong with the network connection or the server.
